full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG DREGS PA LCAM SRING GI SGO NAS DPAL MGON DON LNGA'I GSER SKYEMS 'BUL TSUL LEGS TSOGS LHUN GRUB ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS GSOL, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008B (ZHES DPAL MGON DON LNGA'I GSER SKYEMS 'BUL TSUL LEGS TSOGS LHUN GRUB ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RTZOD PA'I DUS KYI THA MA'I RANG CAG SEMS CAN RNAMS LA MI DANG MI MIN GYI GNOD PA CHAD DBANG PA'I DUS 'DI LA, ,RANG BZHIN KUN LA PHAN PA DANG, ,KHYAD PAR RANG BGEGS DANG DUS SHING @009A *, ,DU MTHO ZHING PHUN SUM TSOGS PA DANG, ,DAM TSIG GTZANG RNAM DPYOD YANGS THU SHI YI GUNG KHUNG TI LING DUNG GI CHING NA RDO RJE DON, ,SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG DZA NA MING CING GYIS BRIS  PA'O, ,BSTAN 'GRO YON LA PHAN 'DOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE'O, ,)
